Sentencas: Films of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) were deposited on substrates of various surface types by pulsed laser deposition (PLD).
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates

Sentencas: We have investigated formation of YSZ films by X-ray diffraction, focused ion beam and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates

Sentencas: The deposited material grows with different morphologies such as columns or grains depending on the substrate used.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates

Sentencas: We observed growth of grains only on the polycrystalline substrates, while on the single crystal columnar crystallites were seen.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates

Sentencas: The YSZ coatings were porous, and nanochannels throughout film layers were observed in all YSZ deposits.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates

Sentencas: Regardless of the type of substrate, all films exhibit a cubic phase of YSZ with the (1 1 1) crystallographic planes parallel to the surface as the major peak.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on various substrates
